Reviews.Title: “Much nicer than I expected”
Reviews.Author: TheDiamond82 Posted by an Easytobook.com traveler
Reviews.Content: absolutely complaints hotel close la rambla la rambla hang nice spacious clean nice shower comfy bed etc price cant complain amazing luxury wise value money location spot read couple reviews dodgy people barcelona centre busy bustling lots people didnt worse lots

Reviews.Title: “Great place to stay in Barcelona.”

Reviews.Content: husband stayed final leg spanish honeymoon reviews cautioned dangerous neighborhood found lively delightful nice staying directly las ramblas commotion bit quick walk las ramblas ten minutes metro stations offer continental breakfast 12 euros breakfast cute cafe door affordable breakfast cafe con leche dined morning 5 euros person little restaurants nearby 5 minute walk appreciated avoid tourist traps las ramblas serving overpriced mediocre food prices fair space paid approximately 125 usd night pretty reasonable hotel modern clean comfortable spacious european hotel standards bathrooms wifi free gripe time log lobby password appreciated incur additional fee service passwords didnt leading internet access desktop computer lobby guest convenient id stay location bit seedy appreciated glimpsed vibrant cultures truly european city barcelona cautious taxi dont feel comfortable didnt taxis aside airport morning left hotel call morning

Reviews.Title: “Fantastic location for a great price”
Reviews.Author: CumbrianTraveller76
Reviews.Content: hotel location easy located square bars restaurants didnt mean noisy night 10 minute walk placa cataluyna hotel clean comfortable equipped included mini bar safe comfortable beds european hotel bathroom spacious bath shower huge fluffy towels chain lacks spanish personality opinion means service facilities monitored head office

Reviews.Content: stayed 5 nights partner october 2010 time barcelona time hotel clean modern friendly staff location huge bonus easy reached foot market morning breakfast 5 min walk choice fresh fruit pastries bonus boyfriend chip shop doors hotel sold fish chips people barcelona time hotel ideal location city offer time taxi football stadium raining

Reviews.Title: “very good place to stay”

Reviews.Content: hotel centrally located square 5 walking minutes rambla modern clean comfortable nice bathrooms window faced sort air shaft didnt allow direct sunlight fresh air enjoy sleep reception staff friendly advise restaurants scooter rents fabulous discover barcelona definitely stay

Reviews.Title: “Elegant, Clean Great Location but Noisy”

Reviews.Content: wonderful trip barcelona marathon time friends hotel perfect location short street rambla middle gorgeous square sits hotel square lined trees cafes tables chairs centre plenty evening type bars square looking literally doorstep hotel spotless reception modern light receptionists friendly helpful negative stayed 3 nights frisatsun friday saturday impossible sleep 4am noise outside died traffic bars shouting etc floor facing square quiet weekend suggest facing square sunday night fine quieter running 26 miles lovely hotel lovely

Reviews.Content: hotel exactly makes excellent base seeing barcelona spotless staff friendly helpful beds sooo comfortable buffet breakfasts feel threat uncomfortable square situated ate twice la opposite hotel food priced lovely evening la barca del salamanca port seafood stay

Reviews.Title: “Nice hotel”
Reviews.Author: Alli_D
Reviews.Content: stayed friends annual shopping trip hotel 10 minute walk la ramblas busy nice restaurants bars square reasonably priced theyre favoured locals offer tapas cosy atmosphere typical modern hotel including safe front facing little balcony overlooking square bathrooms clean functional breakfast typical buffet fare fussiest eaters wouldve found satisfy themselves breakfast waiter helpful couldnt help couldnt downside trip hassled buy drugs hotel night happen days stay hotel

Reviews.Title: “Love the location, OK hotel with lots of little faults”
Reviews.Author: GreenwichNick
Reviews.Content: id 3 stars stars mean stars feels little generous love location 5 mins walk west liceu metro 5 mins west middle las ramblas mins walk parallel st antoni metro stations rambla de raval maintained smart pleasant populated bars restaurants hubbub las ramblas reviews dangerous isnt thats centre barcelona looks folks ok clean reasonable beds bathroom bath shower air con safe fit laptop bad bathroom smelled bad particularly shower steamed common southern european bathroom smell service service dial service receptionist straight pizza occasion called spoke language recognised guy phone fluent reception call fine receptionist grumpy im sorry pal speak 4 european languages usually spanish cant manage tourist industry city help occasionally tv broken realised bar night watch half vs barcelona copa del rey game sound picture guess broken throughout stay deal loud talking corridors door slamming fellow guests id stay unlucky date stay

Reviews.Title: “A Good Bargain and Close to Everything.”
Reviews.Author: jfoster4
Reviews.Content: stayed abba rambla 2 nights late june 2010 location central sites located actual las ramblas 3 blocks street named rambla del raval nice clean staff wonderful mind air conditioning beach umbrella pictures thermostat dont mean cold hot mean summer winter opposite air conditioning thermostat icon manager helped comfortable enjoyed stay recommend
